ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: Read Hindi literarture for the first time since 8th grade. Was enlightened.
Really improved my skills of a language I had been out of touch with.
You will learn a lot about differences in Indian and American culture
As a heritage student, I developed my conversational Hindi, improved my grammar, and became more familiar with the language and contemporary Indian culture
Through this course I gained a deeper knowledge of Hindi Literature and media/pop culture in India. I became more comfortable with my Hindi speaking, writing, and reading skills.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Would've enjoyed more readings. I liked the focus on verbal communication, but didn't find it particularly useful as a learning experience since I am a native speaker.
Very well organized. Content could be modernized.
strengths were the immersion with international students as well as the cultural and historical context of the course
Though the course was fun and allowed me to improve my Hindi, by giving tests or other graded assignments the overall level of engagement and benefits of the course could be increased.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Do it for the language requirement or if you are a non-native speaker looking to learn.
dope class even if you suck at hindi
Yeah! I love Hindi and the entire SAST department
If you are interested in literature and want an easy, fun way to fulfill your language requirement, take this course!
